articles.description: Indian investors can now buy crypto ETFs by depositing INR in Indian exchanges or through the Liberalised Remittance Scheme (LRS) route. The LRS route allows investors to send up to $250,000 per year to a US brokerage account and take exposure to the ETF. How…
articles.content: Gaurav Dahake, CEO, BitBNS, says you can buy it from any exchange in India by depositing your INR and buying those tokens. You can also take the LRS or Liberalised Remittance Scheme route, where you … [+8833 chars]

articles.description: "Most client conversations are about cost-saving efforts and there is a conversation every time about AI," Suzanne Dann said in an interview at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland.
articles.content: Wipro is feeling a "bit more" optimistic about its next financial year as clients spend more on artificial intelligence (AI) to reduce operating costs, the head of the Indian IT firm's Americas 2 bus… [+1680 chars]

articles.title: Foxconn Partners With HCL To Set Up Chip Packaging Unit In India - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The two entities will together set up an outsourced semiconductor assembly and testing facility.
articles.content:
A Foxconn unit and HCL Group are set to enter a joint venture to set up a chip packaging and testing facility in India as the long-time Apple Inc. partner diversifies from China.

articles.title: PLI schemes report card: Production/sales touch Rs 8.61 lakh crore; over 6.78 lakh jobs created so far - The Economic Times
articles.description: PLI schemes form a major plank of India's Atmanirbhar plan. Currently, PLI schemes for 14 key sectors (with an incentive outlay of Rs. 1.97 lakh crore) are under implementation.
articles.content: The govt's Production Linked Incentive (PLI) schemes saw over Rs 1.03 lakh crore of investment till November 2023, official data released on January 17 showed.This investment has resulted in producti… [+1714 chars]
